Greetings,

We (Ewan Tempero, University of Auckland, New Zealand, and Tony Gorscheck,
Blekinge Institute of Technology, Sweden) are looking for software
developers to complete our survey on object-oriented design. We are
interested in finding out whether the theory taught in software design
courses is actually used in real software development. This will not only
help us improve the teaching of software design, but help identify more
practical areas in which to do research.

Our on-line survey has about 20 questions looking how developers think 
about
  some aspects of software design. We hope to get 2000 responses, so if you
think this is a worthwhile project, not only consider doing the survey
yourself, but please also consider asking your colleagues to do the 
same. We
will make the results available to all. More details, and the link to the
survey, can be found at sefolklore.com.

Thank you for your time and effort.

Tony & Ewan
